video.name: INSTANT POT PUMPKIN SOUP (stove top option) | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Creamy Vegan Pumpkin Soup made in Instant Pot Pressure cooker. Stove top option. 8 Ingredients!
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/09/vegan-pumpkin-soup-instant-pot.html
Indian Kitchen Cookbook: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-indian-kitchen-cookbook
Everyday Vegan Kitchen: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen

It’s raining and cold and I just want to sit inside a comforter with a warm bowl of this soup. A creamy, savory, pumpkiny, spiced bowl of comfort.

Aromatics are sauteed, then the pumpkin puree and apple is cooked with ginger, chili, cashews and broth. Then blended and served hot. Garnish with pepper, pumpkin seeds, roasted pumpkin or croutons! Make a double batch because this soup is going to disappear!

Stove-top instructions, nut-free options and other questions mentioned in the recipe and the post. Instructions to use the Whole pumpkin or cubed pumpkin also are mentioned on the post. 

Music:; This feeling by Lakey Inspired
#veganricha #easyveganrecipes #instantpot #pumpkinsoup

Follow: 
My blog: https://veganricha.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VeganRicha
Instagram: https://instagram.com/veganricha
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/veganricha
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/veganricha/

recipeIngredient: 1 tsp oil (, or use 2 tbsp broth to saute)
1  green chili (chopped (use half for less heat or use 1 tbsp chopped bell pepper))
1 cup pumpkin puree (, (canned 100% pumpkin, not pumpkin pie mix) or mashed cooked pumpkin, or use 3 cups/450 gm cubed pumpkin) )
1  apple (chopped (or use 1 cup more pumpkin puree))
2 cups veggie broth or water (, 2.5 cups for thinner)
garnish with pepper flakes or black pepper and pumpkin seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Select saute on the Instant pot. Add a tsp of oil. Add onion, garlic, ginger, chili and a pinch of salt. Cook until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Select saute on the Instant pot. Add a tsp of oil. Add onion, garlic, ginger, chili and a pinch of salt. Cook until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the thyme, cayenne, pumpkin puree, apple, cashews, soy sauce if using, broth and salt and mix well. Cancel saute, Select manual for 12 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the thyme, cayenne, pumpkin puree, apple, cashews, soy sauce if using, broth and salt and mix well. Cancel saute, Select manual for 12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the pressure release naturally once the pressure cooking time is up.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the pressure release naturally once the pressure cooking time is up.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend using immersion blender or regular blender(carefully). Reheat to bring to a boil to thicken or reheat before serving. Taste and adjust salt, add some sweetener if needed, i like to add about a 1/2 tsp sugar. Serve garnished with pepper flakes/black pepper and pumpkin seeds or croutons.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend using immersion blender or regular blender(carefully). Reheat to bring to a boil to thicken or reheat before serving. Taste and adjust salt, add some sweetener if needed, i like to add about a 1/2 tsp sugar. Serve garnished with pepper flakes/black pepper and pumpkin seeds or croutons.

recipeInstructions.text: Stove top Saucepan: Saute the onion, garlic, ginger, chili over medium heat in a saucepan. Add the rest of the ingredients, partially cover and bring to a boil. Continue to cook for 15 minutes. Blend and bring to a boil, taste and adjust flavor, garnish and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Stove top Saucepan: Saute the onion, garlic, ginger, chili over medium heat in a saucepan. Add the rest of the ingredients, partially cover and bring to a boil. Continue to cook for 15 minutes. Blend and bring to a boil, taste and adjust flavor, garnish and serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Store: Refrigerate for upto 4 days. Freeze for upto a month.
recipeInstructions.name: Store: Refrigerate for upto 4 days. Freeze for upto a month.

@graph.keywords: instant pot pumpkin soup, pumpkin apple soup, vegan pumpkin soup without coconut milk
